definitions: The action of moving one's hand or an object across a surface, often quickly and forcefully.
The action of stealing, especially by snatching.
The action of passing a card through an electronic reader.
The action of moving a finger across a touchscreen to navigate or select.
examples: He was swiping at the ball.
She was swiping items from the store.
The customer was swiping her credit card.
He was swiping left on the app.
